scripts.dev:link: rm -rf ~/.claude/plugins/fluxwing && ln -s "$PWD/fluxwing" ~/.claude/plugins/fluxwing && echo '✓ Plugin symlinked for development. Restart Claude Code to load changes.'
scripts.dev:unlink: rm ~/.claude/plugins/fluxwing && echo '✓ Plugin unlinked. Run dev:link to restore development mode.'
scripts.dev:status: ls -la ~/.claude/plugins/fluxwing 2>/dev/null && echo '' && echo '✓ Plugin is symlinked for development' || echo '✗ Plugin not linked. Run npm run dev:link'
